topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Selecting a Region

section.p: When working in HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, you can work in one of two regions:

ul.li: the non-KVM region, also called memphis or denver (based on the deployment template used during the installation)
the KVM region, also called regionone

section.p: In the Horizon interface, you can use a selector to move between the two regions.
For more information on the regions, see the Technical Overview.
